What it is: Analyzes the symbolic and emotional meaning of your media, food, and content intake.
How to use it: List your daily inputs. Ask AI to decode the symbolic nourishment or depletion they carry.
What it changes: Upgrades consumption to intentional symbolic feeding.

What it is: Crafts a symbolic act to mark emotional, physical, or psychological boundaries.
How to use it: Describe a situation where boundaries are weak. Ask AI to design a ritual that marks the limit.

What it is: Symbolically banishes a recurring life pattern as if it were an entity.
How to use it: Describe a repeating issue. Ask AI to embody it and design a symbolic exorcism.
What it changes: Gives psychological closure and detachment from self-sabotaging loops.

What it is: Reorganizes how you mentally file your life events and memories.
How to use it: Describe major life events. Ask AI to relabel or recategorize them for coherence and empowerment.
What it changes: Improves memory structure and emotional narrative clarity.

What it is: Grants yourself symbolic authorization to take a long-denied action.
How to use it: Name a desire you suppress. Ask AI to write a symbolic permission note for you to act.
What it changes: Shifts internal resistance into sanctioned momentum.

What it is: Reveals where others are scapegoated for your own disowned traits.
How to use it: Describe someone you dislike. Ask AI what shadow part of you they symbolize.

What it is: Reframes your experiences as an experimental research protocol.
How to use it: Describe a chaotic time. Ask AI to label your life as a symbolic experiment with control, variables, and hypotheses.
What it changes: Shifts from victimhood to empowered discovery.

What it is: Evaluates what symbolic elements weaken or strengthen your psyche’s defenses.
How to use it: Describe situations that leave you drained. Ask AI to analyze your symbolic immunity response.
What it changes: Improves symbolic resilience against harmful narratives.

What it is: Finds which roles you’re over-identifying with that lead to burnout.
How to use it: Describe what roles you play often. Ask AI which ones drain your vitality and which replenish.
What it changes: Optimizes role distribution in your inner theater.

What it is: Breaks symbolic recurrence of time-wasting or unchanging cycles.
How to use it: Describe a stagnant loop. Ask AI to describe the mythic structure and offer a ritual escape hatch.
What it changes: Restores progression and exit from circularity.
